column6: the Phnom Penh Customs and Excise branch visited a garage in Russey Keo district and found a cut nâ€™ shut operation. Three vehicles were being given a makeover.------ The 2004  Lexii RX 330s  were loaded onto a truck and taken away for further action.------The Customs and Excise Department of Phnom Penh calls for garages that install illegal right-hand modifications to stop immediately and appeal to the public before buying a car to check that it is safe to use.
